skills.name: Passing Time
skills.description: Attacks 3 times and recovers 15% of the Attack Bar each time the attack lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Fate of Destruction
skills.description: Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns to the target enemy and sets up a bomb to blow up after 2 turns. Instantly gains another turn after using this skill.

skill_effect.name: Bomb
skill_effect.description: A bomb is planted on a monster, which is set to detonate in a fixed amount of turns. The damage inflicted is proportional to the enemy monster's attack. When the bomb detonates, affected monsters are stunned for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Promised Time
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and detonates all bomb effects on them, instantly dealing the bomb damage to the targets.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Detonate Bomb
skill_effect.description: Detonate all bomb effects on the enemy target(s)
